generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and lined with trees and parked cars.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Several trees with green foliage are planted along the sidewalks and road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a car is partially visible on the left side.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign and a directional sign.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the sidewalk near the curb on the right side.
